body_html: Yeah, I agree that we should define a clear semantics for this function first. My initial thought was just to use this as a delayed initialization, but we could also support broader uses cases like use this for Resize when we provide a different dims etc.

body: Yeah, I agree that we should define a clear semantics for this function first. My initial thought was just to use this as a delayed initialization, but we could also support broader uses cases like use this for Resize when we provide a different dims etc.
